entry.title: BIP Process and Votes
entry.summary: In this context, a person named "cipher anthem" agrees with someone else's statement and shares their personal experience with Milly on Reddit and Disqus. The comment mentions that Milly tends to dismiss the opinions of those who do not agree with her and labels them as "cultish." The commenter advises the original poster to ignore Milly in order to remain productive. The comment also includes an ad hominem attack towards Milly.
